about_me_text: Hi there, I am a frontend developer based in Mannheim.I used to work as a logistics specialist but after a traffic accident, I had to take a different career path. Since I've always been interested in IT and development, I saw this as a new opportunity and turned my dream into reality.
about_me_text_2: I enjoy finding the optimal solution for an existing problem to ensure that the end-user has an unforgettable experience.
about_me_text_3: Since I don't just see development as a job but as a vocation, I continuously educate myself further.
my_skills_text: I have gained experience in building projects with various front end technologies and concepts.
portfolio_text: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.
portfolio_join_project_text: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
portfolio_el_pollo_loco_text: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and salsa bottles to fight against the killer chicken.
contact_text: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
contact_privacy_policy_text_2: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
